screen.literal: Device Drivers ---> [*] Multiple devices driver support (RAID and LVM) ---> [MD] <*/M> Device mapper support [BLK_DEV_DM] <*/M> Crypt target support [DM_CRYPT] -*- Cryptographic API ---> [CRYPTO] Block ciphers ---> <*/M> AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) [CRYPTO_AES] # For tests: <*/M> Twofish [CRYPTO_TWOFISH] Length-preserving ciphers and modes ---> <*/M> XTS (XOR Encrypt XOR with ciphertext stealing) [CRYPTO_XTS] Hashes, digests, and MACs ---> <*/M> SHA-224 and SHA-256 [CRYPTO_SHA256] Userspace interface ---> <*/M> Symmetric key cipher algorithms [CRYPTO_USER_API_SKCIPHER]
